org.jetel.hadoop.service.mapreduce

Class HadoopMapReduceJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.hadoop.service.mapreduce.HadoopMapReduceJob

  • public class HadoopMapReduceJob
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents basic configuration of Hadoop map/reduce job. Holds all the information that mandatory for the job to be submitted to a jobtracker and executed on Hadoop cluster. In addition, it can store some common job settings like name of the map/reduce job.

    This is a bean class that does not contain any considerable logic nor is it intended to. All attributes are initialized in constructor and are made available by call to standard getters methods. All getters are expected to return non-null values unless otherwise specified by their documentation. This class is immutable.

    Since:
    rel-3-4-0-M2
    See Also:
    HadoopMapReduceService.sendJob(HadoopMapReduceJob, Properties), HadoopJobRunner.runJobLogProgress(HadoopMapReduceService, HadoopMapReduceJob, Properties, boolean)

    • Constructor Detail

      • HadoopMapReduceJob

        public HadoopMapReduceJob(java.lang.String jobName,
                  java.net.URL jobJarFile,
                  java.util.List<java.net.URI> inputFiles,
                  java.net.URI outputDir,
                  java.net.URI workingDirectory,
                  boolean clearOutputDir,
                  HadoopMapReduceJob.APIVersion apiVersion,
                  java.lang.String mapper,
                  java.lang.String combiner,
                  java.lang.String partitioner,
                  java.lang.String reducer,
                  java.lang.String inputFormat,
                  java.lang.String outputFormat,
                  java.lang.String mapperOutKey,
                  java.lang.String mapperOutValue,
                  java.lang.String groupingComparator,
                  java.lang.String sortingComparator,
                  java.lang.String outputKey,
                  java.lang.String outputValue,
                  java.lang.Integer numMappers,
                  java.lang.Integer numReducers,
                  long timeout)
        Initializes new HadoopMapReduceJob that contains at least the mandatory configuration required to execute the job. If not stated otherwise parameters can be null (not specified).
        Parameters:
        jobName - A name of the job typically specified by user as an identification of the job. It is not needed to be unique.
        jobJarFile - Absolute URL to locally stored JAR file containing definition of job classes (for example mapper class). May not be null.
        inputFiles - List containing one or more location(s) of job input file(s) on Hadoop cluster file system. Location(s) can be absolute (in terms of Hadoop file system) or relative to working directory. May not be null not empty.
        outputDir - URI of directory on Hadoop cluster file system where the output of the job should be stored. If this directory does not exist it is created but the parent directory must exist. Can be absolute or relative to specified working directory. May not be null.
        workingDirectory - Hadoop file system URI to working directory of the job. Might be absolute or relative to previous working directory.
        clearOutputDir - If true then in case that output directory of the job already exists it should be deleted before execution of the job.
        apiVersion - version of API used to implement map/reduce job classes.
        mapper - Fully qualified name of class that is to be used as mapper class of the map/reduce job. This class is typically contained in job JAR file. May not be null not empty.
        combiner - Fully qualified name of the class that is to be used as combiner of map/reduce job. This class is typically contained in job JAR file.
        partitioner - Fully qualified name of the class that is to be used as partitioner of map/reduce job. This class is typically contained in job JAR file.
        reducer - Fully qualified name of the class that is to be used as reducer of map/reduce job. This class is typically contained in job JAR file.
        inputFormat - Fully qualified name of input format class for this map/reduce job.
        outputFormat - Fully qualified name of output format class for this map/reduce job.
        mapperOutKey - Fully qualified name of mapper output key class.
        mapperOutValue - Fully qualified name of mapper output value class.
        groupingComparator - FQN of comparator that controls which keys are grouped together for a single call to reducer's reduce method.
        sortingComparator - FQN of comparator that controls how the keys are sorted before they are passed to the reducer.
        outputKey - Fully qualified name of output records key class for this map/reduce job. May not be null.
        outputValue - Fully qualified name of output records value class for this map/reduce job. May not be null.
        numMappers - Number of mappers to be used for job execution or null if not specified. If specified must be greater then 0.
        numReducers - Number of reducers to be used for job execution or null if not specified. If specified must be greater or equal to 0.
        timeout - Time limit for job execution in milliseconds. May not be less then 0. Value of 0 specifies no limit.
